"You may have managed to do it, but I'm not just a teapot, I'm a super teapot. I can brew multiple cups of tea at once, and I have a built-in strainer to make sure the tea leaves don't get into your cup."
"I'm not just a teapot, I'm a smart teapot. I have a built-in timer that reminds you when your tea is ready to steep, and I can even your favorite tea songs to set the mood."
"I'm not just a teapot, I'm a teapot with a personality. I have a built-in voice that greets you when you pour your tea and reminds you to take a sip to savor the flavor."
"I'm not just a teapot, I'm a teapot with a memory. I can remember your favorite tea blends and brew them for you at the touch of a button."

"I'm not just a teapot, I'm a teapot with a story. I come with a built-in booklet that tells the story of the tea leaves inside, and how they were harvested and processed to make the perfect cup of tea."
